name: Blundstone Chisel Toe 067 Boots - Unisex
description: A lean, clean Blundstone Boot classic, in a rich dark brown. Designed to reduce impact as your foot strikes the ground, these deceivingly comfortable boots cushion each step and look good while doing it. A subtle squaring of the toe looks a bit more tailored than the original round toe.Weatherproof leather upper.Uppers are seamlessly fused to the sole to provide resilient construction.SPS reduces skeletal stress by absorbing and dispersing shock.Pull loops for extra leverage.Thermo-polyurethane sole is highly abrasion-resistant and provides exceptional traction. Great for Canadian winters.Square toe, medium width.These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size.
